entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
